attr.title: Roguelight
attr.desc: The deeper you travel the darker it gets, and you only have your arrows to light the way.
attr.inst: Download game from https://managore.itch.io/roguelight. The .exe download is actually a compressed archive; open it 7-zip or some other archiver to extract the files. Copy data.win and .mp3 files to /ports/roguelight/gamedata
